mapper.select: SELECT S.SCHEDULE_NUM, S.MEMBER_ID, S.DOE_NAME, S.START_NUM, S.END_DATE, S.MOD_DATE, S.TITLE, S.PLACE1, S.PLACE2, S.PLACE3, S.MEMO1, S.MEMO2, S.MEMO3, S.DATE1, S.DATE2, S.DATE3, C.LATITUDE AS CITY_LATITUDE, C.LONGITUDE AS CITY_LONGITUDE FROM schedule s JOIN city c ON s.place1 = c.city_name or s.place2 = c.city_name or s.place3 = c.city_name WHERE s.schedule_num = ${scheduleNum}
